commentBody:
I cried when I watched the video. It is frightening to see how women are so easily destroyed by this society.
The root cause? Boys need to be parented better, not dropped in day care and ignored by their parents. America needs for boys to become compassionate men, not abusers. This emotional maturity only comes from caring people.
Also, social media clearly needs to be reigned in; sexist, harassing comments should be penalized. We protect gays and blacks from such caustic speech, why not women?
